name: Isy's Adventure
description:
Hi! My name is Marc, I'm the guy behind πNutStudio. I'm a student who loves programming and gamedev. My vacations are entirely dedicated to this highly time consuming hobby, I hope you'll enjoy this game!

Contact

Do you have any questions, suggestions, or just want to talk? Don't hesitate to reach me using any of these ways:

  • My Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/VK2fhu6
  • My Email: pinutstudioofficial@gmail.com
  • Or check my profile page: https://pinutstudio.itch.io/
